alert.note: Alert for Jim Hogg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 12:01AM CDT until September 16 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR JIM HOGG COUNTY... At 1200 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles southeast of South Fork Estates, or 13 miles north of Agua Nueva, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hebbronville, Agua Nueva, Guerra, Las Lomitas, Gruy Stadium, Randado, Jim Hogg County Airport, Hebbronville High School, South Fork Estates, and Hebbronville Border Patrol Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
